content: cc carefully work the established heel flap pattern until 1 st remains along the left edge of the heel flap pick up before the previous rs shadow wrap make a and knit 12 sts in pin stripe pattern i e k1 rs shadow wrap with cc turn with mc k1 with cc work the first 4 sts on row 4 ws tie mc and cc carefully work needle 1 according to chart a sts 69-72 on the established heel flap pattern until 1 st the row marked for starting the heel flap and remains before the previous ws shadow slip the stitches onto needle 2 wrap make a ws shadow wrap with cc turn work the sts on needle 1 according to chart a row 5 rs tie mc and cc carefully work the sts 1-41 on the next row established heel flap pattern until 1 st remains along the right edge of the heel flap pick up before the previous rs shadow wrap make a 12 sts and work them as follows work the rs shadow wrap with mc turn first 8 sts according to chart a sts 42-49 on row 6 ws tie mc and cc carefully work the same row as just worked on needle 1 the established heel flap pattern until 1 st work the next 4 sts in pin stripe pattern remains before the previous ws shadow starting with cc wrap make a ws shadow wrap with mc work the 27 heel sts as follows working each turn shadow wrap stitch pair as one stitch k1 with repeat row 3-6 until there are one unworked cc and place marker 1 m1 work the next 25 stitch and 6 shadow wraps on each side of the heel stitches according to the appropriate sts heel turn and 13 stitches in the heel pattern in of the heel flap pattern on appropriate row the centre and you have just finished a ws and place marker 2 m2 work the next 5 sts row continue working in the round on the rs in pin stripe pattern starting with cc work the remaining 12 sts on needle 2 according to chart a sts 61-72 on the same row as just set-up for the heel back shaping worked on needle 1 and at the beginning of needle 2 work the 13 centre stitches of the heel turn according to the established heel flap pattern slip the last 5 sts on needle 1 onto needle 2 i e chart a sts 49-61 work the next 7 sts in there are now 36 sts on needle 1 and 60 sts pin stripe pattern i e k1 with cc k1 with mc on needle 2 of which 18 sts before m1 25 sts and working each shadow wrap stitch pair as between m1 and m2 and 17 sts after m2 one stitch call them cherry blossoms page 3/8 heel back shaping on needle 1 work according to chart a sts 1- 36 on appropriate
